net.sf.oereader

Class OEReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.oereader.OEReader

  • public class OEReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class used to read data from a .dbx Outlook Express file. This class takes care of loading the data from the .dbx file, parsing the header, and loading an array of messages to be used by the application.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      OEFileHeader header
      FileHeader of the file
      OEFileInfo info
      FileInfo of the file
